verses.verse: And they <S%H3427>continued<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H758>Syria<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> that <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> you that <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is ours, and we be still, and <S%H3947>take<s%> it not out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> Will you <S%H3212>go<s%> with me to <S%H4421>battle<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramothgilead?<s%> And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I am as you are, my <S%H5971>people<s%> as your <S%H5971>people,<s%> my <S%H5483>horses<s%> as your <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1875>Inquire,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, at the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> together, about <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7433>Ramothgilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> or shall I <S%H2308>forbear?<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up; for the <S%H136>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Is there not <S%H6311>here<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5750>besides,<s%> that we might <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of him?

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> There is <S%H3588>yet<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imlah,<s%> by whom we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but I <S%H8130>hate<s%> him; for he does not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, but <S%H7451>evil.<s%> And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let not the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> an <S%H5631>officer,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4116>Hasten<s%> here <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imlah.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> having <S%H3847>put<s%> on their <S%H899>robes,<s%> in a <S%H1637>void<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> With <S%H428>these<s%> shall you <S%H5055>push<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up to <S%H7433>Ramothgilead,<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> that was <S%H1980>gone<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> declare <S%H2896>good<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> let your <S%H1697>word,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, be like the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of them, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H3588>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, that will I <S%H1696>speak.<s%>

So he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4321>Micaiah,<s%> shall we <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7433>Ramothgilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> or shall we <S%H2308>forbear?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered<s%> him, <S%H5927>Go,<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5704>How<s%> many <S%H6471>times<s%> shall I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> you that you <S%H1696>tell<s%> me <S%H3808>nothing<s%> but that which is <S%H571>true<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that have not a <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H113>master:<s%> let them <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> Did I not <S%H559>tell<s%> you that he would <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, but <S%H7451>evil?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H3651>therefore<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> by him on his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H6601>persuade<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> that he may <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H5307>fall<s%> at <S%H7433>Ramothgilead?<s%> And one <S%H559>said<s%> on <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H3541>manner,<s%> and <S%H2088>another<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3541>manner.<s%>
And there <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H6601>persuade<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>With<s%> which? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and I will be a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5030>prophets.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> You shall <S%H6601>persuade<s%> him, and <S%H3201>prevail<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you.

But <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3895>cheek,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H335>Which<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H2088>way<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you?

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you shall <S%H935>go<s%> into an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>chamber<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> yourself.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah,<s%> and <S%H7725>carry<s%> him <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H526>Amon<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and to <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son;<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7760>Put<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> fellow in the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H3608><s%> and <S%H398>feed<s%> him with <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H3905>affliction<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3905>affliction,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> at all in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by me. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Listen,<s%> O <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one of you.
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H7433>Ramothgilead.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> I will <S%H2664>disguise<s%> myself, and <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> but <S%H3847>put<s%> you on your <S%H899>robes.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself, and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> that had rule over his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3898>Fight<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> with <S%H6996>small<s%> nor <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H905>only<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> that they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> it is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And they <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him: and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> out.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> that it was not the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H310>pursuing<s%> him.

And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4900>drew<s%> a <S%H7198>bow<s%> at a <S%H8537>venture,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1694>joints<s%> of the <S%H8302>harness:<s%> why he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7395>driver<s%> of his <S%H7395>chariot,<s%> <S%H2015>Turn<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3318>carry<s%> me out of the <S%H4264>host;<s%> for I am <S%H2470>wounded.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5927>increased<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H5975>stayed<s%> up in his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> at <S%H6153>even:<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H3332>ran<s%> out of the <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2436>middle<s%> of the <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

And there <S%H5674>went<s%> a <S%H7440>proclamation<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>host<s%> about the <S%H935>going<s%> down of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his own <S%H776>country.<s%>
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And one <S%H7857>washed<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> in the <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>licked<s%> up his <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H2185>armor;<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and the <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>made,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that he <S%H1129>built,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
So <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7977>Shilhi.<s%>

And he <S%H3212>walked<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> he <S%H5493>turned<s%> not aside from it, <S%H6213>doing<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H389>nevertheless<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> places were not <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away;<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H3588>yet<s%> in the <S%H1116>high<s%> places.
And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
